name: Hill Tribe Music
description: Music of the various ethnic groups residing in the hills of Mainland Southeast Asia and Southwest China, also known as the region of Zomia.

children.name: Hmong Folk Music
children.description: Folk traditions of the Hmong people, an ethnic group localized in Laos, Vietnam, China, and Thailand.

children.name: Hmong Pop
children.description: Popular music of the Hmong ethnicity, with roots in the Hmong Folk Music and influenced by Western and East Asian forms of Pop music.

children.name: Lisu Music
children.description: Rooted in the traditions of the Lisu people, an ethnic minority of southern China, Myanmar, Thailand and Arunachal Pradesh, India.
